thread.title: Experienced dad prepares you for the painful realities of parenthood
thread.title_full: Experienced dad prepares you for the painful realities of parenthood

author: Christine Wang
title: Experienced dad prepares you for the painful realities of parenthood
text:
Experienced dad prepares you for the painful realities of parenthood 0 2017-02-21 18:31:31 UTC 
Sure, babies and kids are cute. But a vast majority of parenting is not cute. 
YouTuber How to DAD knows the struggle intimately. That's why this Australian father has put out a series of informative videos on how to live life with a baby. His hilarious guides to parenthood point out the simple, accurate truths about raising a child that most people don't focus on. 
Yes, preparing yourself for changing diapers is important. But so is preparing yourself for... well, just watch in the video above.
